eff-back-tell-user-no.title: No promise to inform you about data requests from governments

tosdr.tldr: The service has made no statement nor promised users to tell them about data sought by governments, thus not giving you a chance to defend yourself against government requests.

eff-back-transparency-data-no.title: No transparency on law enforcement requests

tosdr.tldr: The service is not making clear to their users what standards and rules law enforcement must follow when they seek access to sensitive user data.
